text: Have visited this place sometime ago but felt that a second review is called for because they have maintained their standards well. The staff is friendly and the food is still good and tasty
title: A second visit

text: We dropped by Cafe Beverly around 7.00 on a Wednesday. There were only few occupied tables. We ordered few Thai dishes and couple of drinks. The service was fast but the food was bland. Also, we could not comprehend what the waiter was saying as he was using a different accent (on purpose we believe) , we had to ask a few times to understand what he was saying. Anyway, would like more flavour in the food.
title: Mediocre

text: Though it had been around there for quite sometime and I'm working close by, it wasn't until this I stepped in to Cafe Beverly. My first impression on the restaurant was pretty good. It had nice interior, calm and secluded despite its positioning on the side of a busy road. Only negative thing about the place was that once we took a corner table, there were mosquitoes - a lot of them!The food - there's a good choice and very good in taste. I heard complaints that the portions are not enough for a regular-size eater, but I found the portions quite satisfactory and filling. The prices are reasonable as well. They do have a delivery service which could bring your preferred meal over to you. I'm yet to try that one, but I'm definitely in love with their dishes.
title: Good dining, want to be back

text: The food was absolutely delicious. Nice place for a meal out. The service was excellent & convinient spot with parking.
title: Delicious food & great service

text: I went there many times and had very good experiences.Cafe was excellent with superb food and and was super clean too.The restaurant staff was very welcoming and seemed eager to attend to our every need .The waiting staff were very polite, patient and helpful.They even went the extra mile by recommending the dishes to us.The food arrived pretty fast and was very very good.It was not greasy or oily and the presentation of food was commendable as well.One of the best restaurants around that area.If anyone wants to have a good meal which matches the price Beverly cafe is what I recommend.
title: Great Ambiance with Delicious Food

text: Here they have dishes for all different requirements. For kids no spicy food, adults can have their taste. The taste get varied from dush to dish. The place is clean. Parking is available.
title: Good food

text: A relaxing cafe in Colombo. We went on a weekend that was super busy but the staff was working tireless to cater to everyone. The food was good and there was a band playing which added to the positive ambiance. Would recommend

text: I went out to lunch with my friends here. The restaurant is very cozy. I ordered their chicken burger which I loved. The food took quite long to be prepared and served. The staff could improve their service. Overall it was a pleasant experience.

text: Food was great potions are ok as well some food are really spicy over all good place to hang out prices are very high...
title: Dinner

text: This was the second time I visited this place with a friend (first time it was only for coffee). The steward who served us was Dinuka Madhushan. His service quality was at the international standards and was really friendly and most of all he knew the menu inside out. He recommended a fish based dish for my friend and a chicken based dish for me. Both the dishes were much better than we expected (perfectly cooked with an appropriate amount of spices) and despite it was a quite busy day, we received the food order within c. 15 minutes. After that, we requested Dinuka to recommend a dessert for us and he recommended chocolate chip cheese cake brownie, which was really nice as well.Overall, thanks to Dinuka we had an amazing dinner on a very special day :). We will visit that restaurant again for sure and try to get the services of Dinuka again.
title: One of the best restaurants around that area with top class service

text: Indian cuisine is quite good as they have a north indian chef.Their Veg. Samosa is the best in n around Colombo till date though its looks costly for a plate of 2 pieces.Service is prompt &The restaurant overlooks Diyatha uyana park & with a beautiful view of Diyawanna lake.So, the best time to enjoy is lunch with the view.
title: Nice ambience, nice food, nice shopping

text: Good range of food; tasty; quick;good service, good price and reasonably good ambience. Just what a good restaurant should be.
